Player History
Drafted in 25th round, 397th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Arthur Smith (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/22/2015, off Carlos Valderrama (CIN)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
10/22/2015: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $5,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 8/17/2016 with a Broken Ribs, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Atlanta on 3/2/2018 (Going to ATL: CF Ron Schafer. Going to STL: LF Rayford Ripley)...
